notice.title: This node will trigger when there is an error in another workflow, as long as that workflow is set up to do so. <a href="https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.errortrigger" target="_blank">More info<a>

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: Error Trigger
init_kwargs.description: Triggers the workflow when another workflow has an error
